Moreno_Valley.Moreno Valley College:
Moreno Valley College, or MVC, is a community college located in Moreno Valley, California, United States. The college is part of the Riverside Community College District, as well as the larger California Community Colleges System.


== Accreditation ==
MVC received initial accreditation on January 29, 2010 from the Accrediting Commission for Community and Junior Colleges which meant that MVC met the standards of an independent two-year community college.
